data.name: Galactic Glitch
data.detailed_description:
Galactic Glitch is a 2D roguelite space shooter with physics-based combat. You play a super-advanced AI on the run, infused with multiple personalities that will (mis)guide you along the way. Explore, loot and fight your way to freedom through unknown space. Upgrade your ship with new weapons and powers, analyze your enemies, hone your skills, and destroy anyone that stands in your way.

Features

  • Physics-based Combat - use your Grav Gun to grab and throw objects and enemies and manipulate the battlefield
  • Multi-Part Enemies - Destroy your enemies Piece by Piece, targeting more vulnerable areas and avoiding their armor
  • Combat AI - Enemies patrol in groups and attack smartly. See through their patterns and exploit their weakness
  • Abilities and Items - Plan and collect the right abilities and items for battle, to give yourself the edge
  • Multiple Upgrade Systems - Some systems boost your strength for one run, while others carry over into the future

data.short_description: Galactic Glitch is a roguelite space shooter with tactical, physics-based combat. Explore unknown space, gather upgrades, and master your shape-shift abilities to demolish enemies piece by piece in tough but fair, souls-inspired combat. Explore, destroy, die, repeat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2.6 GHz) / AMD Athlon 64 X2 (2.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 2900 XT (512 MB) / GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
